scenario.name: transfer_before_answer

recv.action:
<ereg regexp="<sip:([^;@]+)" search_in="hdr" header="From:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,remote_number"/> <ereg regexp="<sip:([^;@]+)" search_in="hdr" header="To:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,local_number"/>
<ereg regexp="]+)" search_in="hdr" header="To:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,local_domain" /> <ereg regexp="]+)" search_in="hdr" header="From:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,remote_domain" />

scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 200 OK Via:[$inv_via] From:[$inv_from] To:[$inv_to];tag=[$local_tag] [last_call-id] CSeq: [$inv_cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port];user=phone> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 10000 10000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s= Аttended Transfer c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

INVITE sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_ip]:[$remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_domain]>;tag=[$remote_tag] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: REFER TEST Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 10000 10001 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s= Аttended Transfer c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=sendonly

ACK sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_ip]:[$remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Subject: REFER TEST Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$refer_num]@[$remote_ip]:[$remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag][call_number] To: <sip:[$refer_num]@[$refer_dom]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: REFER TEST Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 20000 20000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s= Аttended Transfer c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

REFER sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_ip]:[$remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_domain]>;tag=[$remote_tag] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] REFER Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Event: refer Subject: REFER TEST Refer-To: <sip:[$refer_num]@[$refer_dom]?Replaces=[$refer_call_id]%3Bto-tag%3D[$refer_remote_tag]%3Bfrom-tag%3D[$local_tag][call_number]> Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$refer_num]@[$remote_ip]:[$remote_port] SIP/2.0 [last_via:] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_ip]:[$remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_domain]>;tag=[$remote_tag] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Subject: REFER TEST Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$refer_num]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$refer_num]@[$remote_ip]:[$remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag][call_number] To: <sip:[$refer_num]@[$refer_dom]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE [authentication] Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: REFER TEST Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 20000 20000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s= Аttended Transfer c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
